title: We the lord lieutenant and Council do hereby think fit to declare and publish that whosoever shall make discovery of any officer or souldier of His Majesties horse and foot guards in this city and suburbs thereof, or of His Majesties army in this kingdom, who having formerly taken the Oathes of Allegiance and Supremacy, hath since been perverted, or hereafter shall be perverted to the popish religion ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council.
author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1677-1685 : Ormonde)
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Mary Crook ...,
